channel.title: europe on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in europe on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.16: Barcelona on my mind
item.description: 5th May, 2011 Hello, Tonight I sleep in Bremen Airport to be on time for a very early morning flight to Barcelona where I will meet two of my close friends from my year in Edinburgh … it will be one of their birthdays during the weekend when we will be there and we will be staying with the kind hospitality of the other’s brother.

item.title: Understanding India using Europe
item.description: It is too difficult for a European to see India as one country when they understand it’s diversity is more at the scale of a continent – their continent.
